en_raw: A four-petal flower full of hidden meaning.
en_clean: A four-petal flower full of hidden meaning.

en_raw: You can gift it to your [friends/allies/family members/actors].
en_clean: You can gift it to your [friends/allies/family members/actors].

en_clean: (With your superior sense of smell, you smell the flower.)

jp_clean: (鋭い嗅覚のおかげで、花の香りをキャッチした。)

en_raw: (What if you gave it to someone important to you?)
en_clean: (What if you gave it to someone important to you?)

jp_clean: (大切な人、重要な人にあげたらどうかな？)

en_raw: (You missed the opportunity to give it to someone.)
en_clean: (You missed the opportunity to give it to someone.)

jp_clean: (誰かにあげる機会を逃してしまった。)

en_clean: (You remove the flower's petals, one at a time.)

en_clean: (The flower doesn't look like anything recognizable now.)

jp_clean: (もう、花は花と言えなくなってしまった。)

en_clean: (Bonnie hesitantly takes the flower, and stares at it intently.)

jp_raw: "きみしかいないじゃないか。"
jp_clean: "きみしかいないじゃないか。"

en_clean: (Isabeau takes the flower and cradles it gently in his hands.)

jp_clean: (イザボーは花を受け取ると、手のひらでそっと包み込んだ。)

en_raw: Oh! For me? Thank you, Siffrin!
en_clean: Oh! For me? Thank you, Siffrin!
jp_raw: \m[vm]えーっ！\!\ わたしに？\!\ ありがとう、シフラン！
jp_clean: えーっ！ わたしに？ ありがとう、シフラン！

en_raw: Hehehe, this is a nice gift... I'll make sure to press it in a book so I can keep it forever!
en_clean: Hehehe, this is a nice gift... I'll make sure to press it in a book so I can keep it forever!
jp_raw: エヘヘ、いいものもらっちゃった...\!\ 本にはさんで押し花にして、ずっと大切にするね！
jp_clean: エヘヘ、いいものもらっちゃった... 本にはさんで押し花にして、ずっと大切にするね！

en_raw: For me? Where did that come from?
en_clean: For me? Where did that come from?
jp_raw: \m[vo]私に？\!\ どこで手に入れたんだ？
jp_clean: 私に？ どこで手に入れたんだ？

jp_raw: まあ、とにかく...\!\ ありがとう、シフラン。
jp_clean: まあ、とにかく... ありがとう、シフラン。

en_raw: It's not like you to be so thoughtful, so I'll definitely keep it as proof.
en_clean: It's not like you to be so thoughtful, so I'll definitely keep it as proof.
jp_raw: 思いやりのあるシフランなんて、珍しいな。\!証拠としてもらっておくよ。

jp_clean: (まあいいか... オディールもうれしそうだし。)

en_clean: (You offer the Bright Flower to the King.)

jp_clean: (「派手な花」を王に差し出した。)

en_raw: Uh, Sif, I don't know how it works where you're from...
en_clean: Uh, Sif, I don't know how it works where you're from...

en_raw: But in Vaugarde, we only give flowers to people we, um... Actually like.
en_clean: But in Vaugarde, we only give flowers to people we, um... Actually like.

en_clean: (The King takes a step forward, and gently takes the flower from your hand.)

en_raw: Bright one...... No matter how this battle ends......
en_clean: Bright one...... No matter how this battle ends......

この戦いがどのような結末になろうとも......

en_raw: Let us make this battle a moment truly worth remembering, then!
en_clean: Let us make this battle a moment truly worth remembering, then!

jp_clean: それではこの戦いを、記憶するにふさわしいものにしようではないか！

en_raw: I'll remember you after I defeat you, bright one.
en_clean: I'll remember you after I defeat you, bright one.

jp_clean: おまえを倒しても、私はお前を覚えておく、明るき者よ。

en_raw: Oh... Oh no. Oh no, no, no, no, no...

jp_clean: ああ... そんな。 ああ、ああ、ああ...

jp_clean: "お花は好きじゃないんですね..."

jp_clean: ごめんなさい！ もう止めようがありませんわ！

en_clean: I'm sorry! You'll be going back! Back when everything started!
